body: the quality of the scan is pretty bad..The story is depressing yet good at the same time

What is this sh*t? Incest aren't supposed to be good. I came here to fap, but I can't the  feels are just too much. For the record, I friggin hate the mere taught of it makes  every inch of me cringe, but this one is different, I actually like this, even if it's an incest.
Wow, idk what to say? Great daughter at least

So could anyone please search and find the official English Version of this manga asap?

Thanks, Ciao!
